title: For Sale: T206 Walter Johnson portrait SGC 10 SOLD
author: the-illini

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Walter Johnson portrait SGC 10 SOLD
posts.post_content:
Nice looking card overall, unfortunately someone decided to put a thumbtack through Walter's chin.Sweet Caporal back with Factory 649 overprint. SOLD or best offer delivered. PM or email me at [url]crb_972@yahoo.com[/url] with questions or to purchase.

Thanks

Chris
Bump - taking offers on this one...
